lead_paragraph: Andy Laungani, a tailor based in Lexington, Ky., is a fixture in jockeys’ rooms across the country where he ensures that the riders are as colorfully dressed off the racetrack as they are on it.

headline.print_headline: Tailor Earns His Stripes at Racetrack
headline.main: A Jockeys’ Tailor Earns His Stripes at the Racetrack

snippet: Andy Laungani, a tailor based in Lexington, Ky., is a fixture in jockeys’ rooms across the country where he ensures that the riders are as colorfully dressed off the racetrack as they are on it.
abstract: Profile of tailor Andy Laungani, to whom top jockeys turn when they want custom made suits; Laungani notes that even though jockeys' suits use less fabric, they are harder to sew because the workmanship at that size is more 'difficult.'
